author: Odeinoichus
title: Speedy Polybag Build
review:
Set #30187 Fast Car: As Polybags go this isn't the worst offender ever designed, however it is a rather limited set to talk about. No Pros or Cons here, or long speeches about the numerous different elements, we'll just get right on to an overview.

As creator sets go this isn't bad, it's not great or anything, but it could be worse. The Fast Car is a quick build using your standard parts. It rolls quite nicely and the colour combination looks pretty good, I suppose the only thing wrong with it is the pieces chosen for the windshield, they don't match very well with the rest of the model.

For Polybag enthusiasts I'd say this is one you're going to want, for parents this makes a great little checkout impulse buy and the car is very playable, even the spoiler can be angled anyway you want. Unless you're really into Creator builds of this scale I'd say you'd be better off getting a polybag with a mini-figure or two in it. Mildly recommended.
